## ColumnCollection.RemoveAt method

从表中删除指定位置的列。

```csharp
public void RemoveAt(int firstColumnIndex, bool withAttachedRows)
```

| 范围 | 类型 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| firstColumnIndex | Int32 | 要删除的列的索引。 |
| withAttachedRows | Boolean | True 也删除所有附加的列。 |
